cause.description:
Youth for Equality was started when government of India passed a quota bill which was against the right of education of poor students. Though this controversial bill was stayed due to legal efforts of Youth for Equality, still government is acting through many indirect method to implement its politically motivated bill to get more vote in future. However, Youth for Equality has started it effort to provide a mechanism so that poor student from any section of society can avail higher education.
1. Education should be available for all deserving candidates
2. Indigent has all right to get admission in higher education if it has talet for the same
3. Social Justice is equally important for each secation of society
cause.mission: Help the poor students of India to get higher education.
cause.name: Youth for Equality
